K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:412a-1: a'arya mah'a y'a no pa de sha n'a ma ma h'a y'a na s'u tra /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:412a-3: 'phags pa theg pa chen po'i man ngag ces bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:412a-6: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:412a-7: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:412b-0: de @412b bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul rin po che bkod pa'i 'khor gyi khyams /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:412b-2: bsod nams chen po'i rgyan gyi tshogs bsags pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:412b-3: spyod pa chen po'i rgyu mthun pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:412b-4: sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi rnam par smin pas mngon par grub pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:412b-5: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i gnas bstan pa mtha' yas pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:412b-6: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pas byin gyis brlabs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:412b-7: chags pa med pa'i spyod yul gyi ye shes la 'jug pa dga' ba rgya chen po skyed pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:412b-12: ye shes kyis rnam par dpyod pa de la ma chags par rtogs pas 'jug pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:412b-13: bskal pa mu med par mngon par bstod pa; yon tan gyi tshogs thams cad dpag tu med pa na bzhugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:412b-14: bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni mnyam pa nyid du mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:412b-15: chos kyi 'khor lo ni shin tu bskor /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:412b-16: slob ma shin tu dul ba'i tshogs ni mtha' yas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:412b-17: chos thams cad la mnga' dbang ni brnyes /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:412b-18: sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa'i tshul ni shin tu mkhyen /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:412b-19: dbang po'i dam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni brnyes /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:413a-0: sems can thams cad kyis nyon mongs pa'i bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba kun tu 'joms pa @413a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:413a-2: sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa lhun gyis grub pa ni rgyun ma bcad cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:413a-3: dge slong 'bum phrag drug cu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs gcig ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:413a-4: thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:413a-7: dbang dang ldan par gyur pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:413a-8: sems shin tu rnam par grol ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:413a-9: shes rab shin tu rnam par grol ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:413a-15: bdag gi don rjes su thob pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:413a-16: srid par kun tu sbyor ba yongs su zad pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:413a-17: yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin tu rnam par grol ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:413a-18: sems kyi dbang thams cad kyi dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:413a-19: nyon mongs pa'i bag chags mtshams sbyor ba thams cad kun tu bcom pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:413a-20: de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi rgyal po'i sras /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:413a-21: chos zab mo la gnas par mkhas pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:413a-22: mi dmigs pa'i chos las byung ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:413a-25: sbyin pa'i gnas chen por gyur pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:413a-26: de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' la shin tu zhugs pa sha stag go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:413a-27: byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:413b-0: brjod du med @413b pa dang yang thabs gcig ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:413b-1: thams cad kyang sems kyi skad cig gcig la sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas par 'gro ba la mkhas pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:413b-2: de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:413b-3: rim gro byed pas nges par 'byung ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:413b-4: chos mnyan cing yang dag par nod pa'i ngoms mi shes pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:413b-5: rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par sems can thams cad yongs su smin par byed pa la mngon par brtson pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:413b-7: shes rab dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa'i sgrib pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa la rab tu gnas pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:413b-10: spros pa thams cad las shin tu 'das pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:413b-11: thams cad mkhyen pa'i sa las nye bar gyur pa sha stag la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:413b-13: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po glog lta zhes bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:413b-14: g-yul las rnam par rgyal ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:413b-15: rnam par snang mdzad snying po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:413b-16: rnam par gnon par dpa' ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:413b-19: rnam par lta ba'i mig dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:413b-20: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mun pa'i phung po dang bral ba zhes bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:413b-21: de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med grangs med /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:413b-26: brjod du med pa dag thabs gcig ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:414a-1: 'das byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la 'jug par nges par 'byung ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:414a-2: sgrib pa med pa'i sgo zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs byang chub sems dpa'i lam bkod pa la dmigs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:414a-3: sangs rgyas kyis chos zab mo stobs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:414a-6: chos thams cad la dbang byed pa'i gzungs kyi phyag rgya'i sgo la 'jug pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:414a-7: so so yang dag par rig pa la rnam par nges pa'i sgo la 'jug pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:414a-8: mngon par shes pa chen po'i ye shes la 'jug pa khong du chud pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:414a-9: phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor la mi skye ba'i chos ston pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:414a-10: theg pa gcig tu yang dag par 'du ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:414a-11: chos kyi dbyings tshul gcig ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:414a-13: sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:414a-15: ston pa snying po dang ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:414a-16: chos rnam par gdon mi za ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:414a-17: bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par 'jig par byed pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:414a-18: tshul bzhin gyi chos kyi tshul la 'jug pa khong du chud pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:414a-20: lta bar song ba thams cad 'dul ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:414a-21: shes rab dang ye shes thogs pa med pa'i rjes su 'jug pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:414a-22: mnyam pa med cing mtha' yas pa'i yongs su bsngo ba la mkhas pa'i thabs kyi ye shes ston pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:414b-0: sangs rgyas kyi chos @414b thams cad mnyam pa nyid du shes pa'i rjes su 'jug pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:414b-1: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes la 'jug pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:414b-2: byin gyi rlabs thogs pa med pa'i sgo la 'jug pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:414b-3: chos thams cad ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par gdon mi za bar ston pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:414b-4: mi rtog rnam par mi rtog la mnyam pa nyid du 'jug pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:414b-5: rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba zab mo khong du chud pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:414b-7: ye shes kyi tshogs thams cad gsog pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:414b-10: thugs mnyam pa nyid kyi rgyun dang ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:414b-15: shes rab mi zad pa mngon par sgrub pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:414b-16: nyan thos kyi theg pas 'dul ba'i phyir 'phags pa'i bden pa'i tshul 'jug pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:414b-17: rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pas 'dul ba'i phyir lus dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:414b-18: sems rab tu dben par shes pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:414b-19: theg pa chen pos 'dul ba'i phyir thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi sa ra dbang bskur ba 'thob pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:414b-20: de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan brjod pa'i phyir chos thams cad la dbang byed pa'i tshul la 'jug pa brjod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:414b-27: rnam par shes par mdzad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:414b-28: rab tu shes par mdzad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:415a-0: yang dag par rab tu ston @415a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:415a-1: to; ;de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis shin tu rnam par gdon mi za ba'i don gyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lta bur rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston pa na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:415a-2: 'khor de nyid du bu mo rin chen zhes bya ba zhig 'dus par gyur te 'dug pa de stan las langs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:415a-3: lag pa g-yas par mu tig gi se mo do thogs nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:415a-4: bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:415a-7: bden pa'i tshig gang gis sems can chen po 'di dag gis bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'dus pa'i le'u 'di bas par chub par 'dzin par 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:415a-8: phyogs bcu rnams su'ang rgyas par bgyid par 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:415a-9: sems can dpag tu ma mchis pa rnams bla na med pa'i chos dkon mchog gis mthar gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la 'god par 'byung ba'i bden pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:415a-10: bden pa'i tshig des bdag gis mu tig gi se mo do 'di de bzhin gshegs pa la 'bul lags te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:415a-11: de de bzhin gshegs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:415a-12: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi dbu'i gtsug gi mtshams su mu tig gi se mo do'i khang pa brtsegs pa kun tu gnas shing bkod pa ci 'dra bas skyes bu dam pa de dag byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:415b-0: de dag gis @415b sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa ci 'dra bar 'gyur ba de 'dra ba dag khang pa brtsegs pa de dag las kun tu dga' zhing 'khor thams cad kyis bkod pa 'di mthong nas yi rangs par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:415b-1: de nas bu mo rin chen gyis mu tig gi se mo do de bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su bor ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:415b-2: mu tig gi se mo do bor ma thag tu de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:415b-3: bu mo rin chen gyi bden pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:415b-4: bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug gi mtshams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:415b-5: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi spyi gtsug gi mtshams su khang pa brtsegs pa chen po shin tu yangs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:415b-11: shin tu rnam par phye ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:415b-12: legs par grub pa gnas par gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:415b-13: byang chub sems dpa' de dag sngon bdag cag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa 'di 'dra bar gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:415b-14: byang chub kyi snying po 'di 'dra bar gyur cig ces smon lam btab pa'i khyad par ci 'dra ba de lta bu'i bkod pa dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis khang pa brtsegs pa de dag las mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:415b-15: mthong nas kyang ngo mtshar du gyur nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:415b-16: bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:416a-0: 'di ltar ji tsam du bdag cag gis bskal pa grangs ma mchis par smon lam mngon par 'dus bgyis pa de thams cad bu mo @416a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:416a-1: rin chen gyi skad cig gcig la bstan pa ni bu mo rin chen 'di bden pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs can lags te ngo mtshar to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:416a-2: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:416a-5: ji skad smras pa de bzhin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:416a-6: bu mo rin chen 'di bden pa'i byin gyi rlabs las nges par byung ba'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:416a-8: bu mo rin chen gyis sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug las dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun nas bden pa'i byin gyi rlabs 'di yongs su blangs te; des na bu mo rin chen 'dis ji skad smras pa de ltar kun tu gnas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:416a-9: gal te bu mo rin chen gyis thams cad dang ldan pa'i stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams ni me tog gis rab tu gang bar kun tu gnas par gyur cig ces smras na'ang de de bzhin du 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:416a-14: gos kyis rab tu gang bar kun tu gnas par gyur cig ce na'ang de de bzhin du 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:416a-15: gal te bar snang 'di thams cad gdugs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:416a-17: ba dan gyis brgyan par kun tu gnas par gyur cig ce na'ang de de bzhin du 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:416b-0: chus 'jig pa byung ba la me yis 'jig par gyur cig ce na'ang de de bzhin du @416b 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:416b-1: gal te me yis 'jig pa byung ba la chu yis 'jig par gyur cig ce na'ang de de bzhin du 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:416b-2: thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor 'di 'khor los bsgyur ba'i kha dog dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:416b-3: gzugs su gyur cig ce na'ang de de bzhin du 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:416b-4: de bzhin du 'jig rten skyong ba'i kha dog dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:416b-8: dbang phyug chen po'i kha dog dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:416b-13: dge bsnyen ma'i kha dog dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:416b-14: gzugs su gyur cig ce na'ang de de bzhin du 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:416b-15: gal te bdud re re la'ang lag na mtshon thogs pa'i bdud kyi sde bye ba phrag brgya lhag pa la bdud dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:416b-16: bdud kyi ris thams cad kyi ral gri dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:416b-20: mtshon cha sna tshogs gang yin pa de dag thams cad rin po che sna tshogs kyis spras pa'i mu tig gi sems mo dor kun tu gnas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:416b-24: tsampa ka'i lda ldir kun tu gnas par gyur cig ce na'ang de de bzhin du 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:416b-25: gal te 'brog dgon par bza' ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:417a-0: kha zas med pa dag tu khyim bye ba phrag bco brgyad pa'i grong khyer chen po kun tu @417a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:417a-3: kha zas mang po byung bar gyur cig ce na'ang de de bzhin du 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:417a-4: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na gzugs su snang ba de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs su kun tu gnas par gyur cig ce na'ang de de bzhin du 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:417a-5: 'khor 'di thams cad nam mkha' la gnas par gyur cig ce na'ang de de bzhin du 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:417a-7: gal te bu mo rin chen gyis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chos ston par 'jug pa ji snyed pa de bar snang 'di las lhag chad med cing mtha' dag rdzogs par rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan par byung bar gyur cig ce na'ang de de bzhin du 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:417a-8: gang bu mo rin chen gyi las de cung zad kyang don med pa ma yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:417a-9: de nas bu mo rin chen gyis bden pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:417a-12: cho 'phrul gyi rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di kun tu bstan nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:417a-13: bcom ldan 'das la tshul dang mthun pa'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:417a-14: rin chen 'byung gnas ye shes rin chen mnga'//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:417b-0: rin chen @417b mchog ston yon tan mtha' yas pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:417b-1: rgyal po'i rgyal po dgra dang shar gnyer gcod //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:417b-2: byang chub yan lag rin chen nor bdun sbyin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:417b-3: rin chen 'od kyi 'od ni mtha' yas pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:417b-4: nor bu rin chen rnam pa sna tshogs 'od //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:417b-5: rin chen dam pa rgyal ba rin chen tog /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:417b-6: bde gshegs khyod la rin chen rnams kyis mchod //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:417b-7: rdo yi snying pos snying nor bu gang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:417b-8: snang 'od dri med snying po nor bu dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:417b-9: rin po che dang nyi ma zla ba'i 'od //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:417b-10: khyod kyi sku yi 'od kyis zil du rlag /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:417b-11: thub pa khyod kyi sku tshad brtag par ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:417b-12: sa bcu'i bar la gnas pas mi dmigs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:417b-13: 'jig rten gtso khyod sa la bzhugs kyang ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:417b-14: rdzu 'phrul yon tan srid pa'i rtser gnas mthong //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:417b-15: rgyal ba'i 'khor rnams thams cad re res kyang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:417b-16: rgyal ba rang rang mdun na bzhugs par shes //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:417b-17: thams cad phyogs nas mngon sum mngon par yang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:417b-18: kun nas sgo nas mtshungs pa med pa mthong //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:417b-19: la las bzhugs dang mnal dang 'chags pa dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:417b-20: 'khor rnams la las bde gshegs gsung ba dang //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:437b-15: 'dus ma byas pa'i don ni don so so yang dag par rig pa'o //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:437b-18: dge 'dun la dpyod pa ni nges pa'i tshig go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:437b-19: gang rab tu ston pa de ni spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:437b-20: btsun pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:437b-21: de ltar na chos thams cad kyi tshig bstan pa ni so so yang dag par rig par blta'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:437b-22: de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:438a-0: bu mo rin chen gyis bla na med pa yang dag par @438a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:438a-1: rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa nas ni ji srid cig lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:438a-2: de bzhin gshegs pa ni gang gi gsung rab lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:438a-3: de skad ces gsol pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:438a-4: bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:438a-6: sdon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa grangs med pa'i yang ches grangs med par gyur pa de'i tshe de'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs zhes bya ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:438a-7: mkhyen pa dang zhabs su ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:438a-10: skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:438a-13: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du 'byung ngo; ;sh'a radva ti'i bu /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:438a-14: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas 'jig rten gyi khams shin tu rnam par dag pa zhes bya bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:438a-16: 'jig rten gyi khams shin tu rnam par dag pa'i longs spyod ni dga' ldan gyi lha'i longs spyod dang 'dra bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:438a-18: de'i byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun ni byang chub sems dpa' dag pa sha stag ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:438b-0: byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag bdun cu rtsa drug @438b thams cad kyang phyir mi ldog pa gzungs dang; spobs pa las nges par byung ba sha stag go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:438b-2: de'i tshe de'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs kyi gsung rab la 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi dbang phyug rin po che'i mdzod mtha' yas pa dang ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:438b-3: bsod nams kyi rnam par smin par yongs su dag pa zhes bya ba zhig byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:438b-5: rgyal po bsod nams kyi rnam par smin pa yongs su dag pa la btsun mo'i 'khor gyi bud med stong phrag brgyad khri bzhi stong yod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:438b-6: de dag thams cad kyang skye ba bzang mo sha stag go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:438b-7: de la bu pho khri yod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:438b-8: thams cad kyang mthu bo che'i stobs dang ldan pa sha stag go; sh'a radva ti'i bu /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:438b-9: de ltar rgyal po bsod nams kyi rnam par smin pa yongs su dag pa'i bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang bcas pa de la yid du 'ong ba'i na bza' dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:438b-12: snyun gsos kyi rkyen sman dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:438b-14: bde bar sbyar ba thams cad kyis lo bye ba phrag sum cu rtsa drug tu bsnyen bkur byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:438b-15: de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:439a-1: 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs de'i sku tshe'i tshad ci tsam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:439a-2: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:439a-4: de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs de'i sku tshe'i tshad ni bar gyi bskal pa bcu thub po //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:439a-6: de ltar rgyal po bsod nams kyis rnam par smin pa yongs su dag pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs de la mchod pa dpag tu med pa byas na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:439a-9: g-yog dang bcas te srog chags khrag khrig dgu bcu rtsa gnyis kyis mdun du bdar nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs ga la ba der song ste phyin pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:439a-10: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:439a-11: bye ba brgya stong gis shin tu spras pa'i mu tig gi se mo ngos mngon par bkab nas thal mo sbyar te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:439a-12: de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:439a-14: bdag gis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa thams cad kyis mchod pa bgyis na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:439a-15: bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa ma bgyis pa'i mchod pa khyad par du 'phags pa gzhan na la la mchis sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:439a-16: de skad ces gsol pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:439b-0: de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs kyis rgyal po bsod nams kyis rnam pa smin pa yongs su dag pa de la @439b 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:439b-2: gang khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa ma byas pa'i mchod pa dam pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:439b-5: khyod kyi mchod pa 'dis de'i brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro ba nas rgyu'i bar du'ang mi bzod pa gzhan yod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:439b-7: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs des rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pa de'i bsam pa mkhyen nas tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:439b-8: zhing rnams bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma gangg'a'i bye ma snyed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:439b-9: gang gis rin chen bkang ste bskal pa bye brgyar rtag rgyun byin pa yi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:439b-10: bsod nams des ni gang zhig sems can don phyir snying brtse snying rje bskyed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:439b-11: byang chub zhugs pa'i bsod nams de yi grangs cha gang du'ang 'gyur ma yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:439b-12: sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig stong phrag du ma gangg'a'i bye snyed la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:439b-13: bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig mang por me tog spos kyis mchod pa byas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:439b-14: byang chub brtan pa phan byed gang zhig gom pa bdun ni rab bor bas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:439b-15: rgyal ba mchod pa 'di ni dam pa gtso bo gya nom mchog gi phul //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:439b-16: gang zhig byang chub sems bskyed 'jig rten 'dren par 'gyur bar smon gdab pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:439b-17: de ni sbyin pa de bzhin tshul khrims gzhal yas bzod pa'i stobs kyi mchog /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:440a-0: de ni brtson 'grus brtan pa ting 'dzin gzhal yas @440a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:440a-2: de ni mtha' yas bsags pa'i bsod nams lam ste zad par 'gyur ma yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:440a-3: gang zhig bsam pas yid rab dga' zhing thams cad mkhyen la rab 'jug pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:440a-4: bsngags dang brjod dang grags dang gzugs dang g-yog ni shin tu mdzes pa 'thob //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:440a-5: des ni longs spyod dbang phyug stobs rnams rtag 'thob sems dang dran pa 'phags //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:440a-6: de ni 'khor los bsgyur rgyal stobs ldan de ltar brgya byin tshangs par 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:440a-7: mi gang la la byang chub rdul dang bral ba tha med zhi 'jug pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:440a-8: de ni ngan song ngan 'gro lam dang mi khom brgyad po thams cad gcod //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:440a-9: de ni lha dang mi yi lam rnams rab tu 'byed cing rnam par sbyangs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:440a-10: long bar mi 'gyur 'on par ma yin dbang po thams cad tshang bar 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:440a-11: gang zhig byang chub 'jug cing blo gros ldan pa sems can skyabs gnyer ba //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:440a-12: sangs rgyas mthong zhing de dag la yang mchod byed mkhas pa chos kyang nyan //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:440a-13: shes rab ye shes ldan zhing blo ni shin tu rlabs che chen por 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:440a-14: the tshom nem nur med cing nga rgyal bral ba rtag tu drang por 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:440a-15: gang zhig byang chub sems bskyed 'di 'dra'i dpal gyi byang chub 'jug pa de //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:440b-0: 'dod pa'i dga' la dga' ba rnyed par mi 'gyur chos la dga' @440b ba rnyed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:440b-1: de nas 'jig rten dri mas gos par mi 'gyur chu las padma bzhin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:440b-2: shes rab ye shes yon tan rnams kyis mi ngoms phyir zhing tshol bar byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:440b-3: byang chub zhugs nas snying rjes mtha' yas gang zhig zad par mi nus pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:440b-4: skyabs dang gling dang dpung gnyen dag dang sems can rnams kyi pha mar 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:440b-5: de nas 'gro ba sman pa slob dpon bla ma ded dpon chen por 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:440b-6: 'jig rten dang ni 'jig rten 'das pa'i sman sbyin nad rnams zhi bar byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:440b-8: de nas rgyal po bsod nams kyis rnam par smin pa yongs su dag pa des de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs de las byang chub kyi sems kyi yon tan dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:440b-10: bsod nams tshad med pa 'di thos nas tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs shing rab tu dga' ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:440b-12: yid bde ba skyes nas bsam pa thag pa nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:440b-13: bud med kyi 'khor de dag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:440b-17: skye bo'i tshogs chen po de la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:440b-18: sems can dag la snying rje byams bskyed nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:440b-19: nga ni byang chub dam pa mchog la zhugs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:440b-20: gang zhig nga la dga' ba yid 'ong 'dod //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:440b-21: de nas byang chub sems brtan yang dag bskyed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:441a-2: sngon chad 'khor ba bye ba ma shes kyi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:441a-3: byang chub mchog gi lam du zhugs shig dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:441a-4: sems can don brtson sdug bsngal bde bar 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:441a-5: gang dag rdzu 'phrul spobs pa ye shes dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:441a-6: shes rab 'khor dang de bzhin mchod pa dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:441a-7: sangs rgyas rnam gzigs yon tan dpag med pa; ;'di dag thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems las byung;/
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:441a-8: lha mi'i 'jig rten bde ba gang dag dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:441a-9: brgya byin tshangs pa 'khor los bsgyur ba dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:441a-10: gang dag zag bcas zag pa med pa'i bde //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:441a-11: 'di dag thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems las byung //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:441a-12: bsdu dang bsam gtan de ltar tshad med gang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:441a-13: de bzhin gang dag pha rol phyin lam dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:441a-14: mngon shes rig dang so so yang dag rig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:441a-15: 'di dag thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems las byung //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:441a-16: stobs bcu sangs rgyas kha dog bsam yas dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:441a-17: gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:441a-18: gang dag sangs rgyas chos yangs dpag med pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:441a-19: de kun rnam dag sems las nges par byung //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:441a-20: gang zhig zhing rnams bye ba bskyod pa dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:441a-21: thams cad dbyangs kyis go bar byed pa dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:441a-22: 'od dang bkod pas dri med rgyas 'dod pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:441b-0: mkhas pa des ni byang chub sems @441b skyed cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:441b-1: mkhas pa gang zhig byang chub sems bskyed pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:441b-2: phyogs rnams kun tu mchod pa'i 'os su 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:441b-3: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis bsngags par 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:441b-4: gsol ba ma btab 'gro ba'i bshes su 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:441b-5: gal te sangs rgyas thams cad gzigs pa yis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:441b-6: bskal pa mang por bsngags pa brjod kyang ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:441b-7: byang chub sems las bsod nams gang byung ba //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:441b-8: brjod pas zad par 'gyur ba ma yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:441b-9: rgyal po bsod nams kyis rnam par smin pa yongs su dag pas tshigs su bcad pa de dag smras ma thag tu de nas srog chags khrag khrig phrag dgu bcu rtsa gnyis po de dag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:441b-10: rgyal po'i btsun mo'i 'khor de dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:441b-11: bu khri bo de dag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:441b-12: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams de'ang rnam pa drug tu rab tu g-yos so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:441b-13: lha bye ba phrag bzhi bcus kyang rjes su yi rang ngo zhes sgra byung nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:441b-14: 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po des phyis kyang lo bye [?] ba [?] phrag bcur de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs de la bde bar sbyar ba thams cad kyis bsti stad du byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:442a-1: do; ;tshangs par spyad pa'i bslab pa'i gnas lnga yongs su blangs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:442a-2: rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par de bzhin gshegs pa de la chos nyan pa'i phyir g-yog dang bcas te dong nas chos nyan to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:442a-3: des phyi zhig na pu thu bo rgyal por bcug nas skra dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:442a-4: kha sbu bregs te gos dur smig bgos nas yang dag par dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:442a-5: de de ltar rab tu byung nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:442a-10: 'dul ba'i tshig dang; ;tshig mi zad pa bzhi po 'di dag gi yi ge'i mtshams sbyar ba las yongs su 'jal lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:442a-11: de lo bye ba tshangs par spyod pa la mkhas pa'i rjes su song ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:442a-12: rgyal po rab tu byung ba des rjes su bslabs nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:442a-13: de na stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can bgrang ba las shin tu 'das pa dag de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs de'i gsung rab la rab tu byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:442a-15: de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po bsod nams kyi rnam par smin pa yongs su dag pa zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du sems na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:442a-17: bu mo rin chen 'di nyid do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:442b-0: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs de las bu mo rin @442b chen 'dis byang chub tu sems bskyed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:442b-1: sh'a radva ti'i bus gsol pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:442b-2: bcom ldan 'das las kyi sgrib pa ji lta bu zhig gis bu mo 'dis bud med kyi dngos po yongs su bzung /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:442b-3: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:442b-5: byang chub sems dpa' dag ni las kyi sgrib pas bud med kyi dngos po yongs su mi 'dzin to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:442b-8: byang chub sems dpa' dag ni sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir mngon par shes pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:442b-12: shes rab kyi stobs kyis bud med kyi dngos po yongs su 'dzin to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:442b-15: bu mo rin chen 'di bud med do snyam na'ang de ltar mi blta yi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:442b-17: 'di ni mngon par shes pa'i stobs can gyi byang chub sems dpar blta ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:442b-18: de la ni bud med kyi chos dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:442b-20: bu mo 'di ni dge ba'i chos thams cad dang ldan no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:442b-24: bu mo rin chen 'dis ni dzambu'i gling 'dir bu mo gzhon nu dgu khri bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su smin par byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:442b-25: de nas bu mo rin chen gyis tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:442b-26: btsun pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:443a-1: sems can rnams la chos ston spyad pa mi spyod dam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:443a-2: sh'a radva ti'i bus smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:443a-4: bdag ni skyes pa'i lus 'di nyid kyang mi 'dod na bud med kyi lus yongs su gzung ba lta ci smos /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:443a-6: btsun pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:443a-13: btsun pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:443a-14: byang chub sems dpa' ni sems can thams cad las khyad par du 'phags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:443a-16: 'di ltar gang nyan thos kyis smad pa de la ni byang chub sems dpa' mi smod do //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:455b-4: yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku yongs su bsgrubs pa'i phyir lus kyi las legs par sbyor ba'i rgyun kyang mi gcod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:455b-5: tshor ba la zhugs pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa sgom ste /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:456b-4: shes rab kyi dbang po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:456b-7: nges par rtog pa'i shes rab dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:456b-8: mi thul ba'i shes rab dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:456b-9: zil gyis mi non pa'i shes rab dang /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:456b-16: thos nas kyang shes rab kyis khong du chud cing rtogs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:456b-17: mgo'i thod la me 'bar ba bzhin du bsti stang byed cing thos pa tshol la thos pa snying por byed pa yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:456b-19: chos 'dod cing chos kyi kun dga' bas dga' la mos pa yin /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:456b-24: de bde ba'i yo byad mi 'dod pa gang yang med do //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:457b-5: de la de med pa yin no //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:457b-9: lung du ma bstan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:457b-10: kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:457b-11: kha na ma tho ba med pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:457b-12: zag pa dang bcas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:457b-16: kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:457b-20: chos kyi sgo thams cad khong du chud cing rtogs pa bstan pa shes pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:457b-21: zhing thams cad kyi rdul phra rab thams cad dang mnyam pa'i bskal pa bstan pa shes pa dag la de'i shes rab de thogs pa med cing sgrib pa med pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:457b-22: de'i shes rab de sngon gyi mtha' dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:457b-24: da ltar byung ba'i dus la chags pa med cing sgrib pa med de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:457b-25: thams cad du thogs pa med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:458a-0: phyi ma'i mthar de bzhin gshegs @458a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:458a-1: pa rnams la bstan kyang thug pa med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:458a-2: dpyod pa'i 'du byed kyi ting nge 'dzin shin tu bsgoms pas rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi sgo gcig las chos kyi sgo thams cad snang zhing /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:458a-9: rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par khyim gyi gnas don du mi gnyer ba yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:458a-10: 'dod pa don du mi gnyer ba yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:458a-11: de khyim nas 'byung bar dga' zhing rab tu 'byung ba mang ba yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:458a-14: dben pa la bab cing chos zab mo sgom pa'i rnal 'byor la brtson te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:458a-18: rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum po 'di dag sgom mo //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:458a-20: dmigs par lta ba mtshan ma la mngon par dga' ba thams cad kyis rtogs par mi 'gyur ba'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum bo de dag bsgoms pas sgrib pa med pa zhes bya ba'i rnam par thar pa kun tu skye'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:458b-0: chags pa med @458b pa'i ye shes kyi snang ba yang rab tu 'thob bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:458b-1: bdud kyi yul las kyang shin tu 'da'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:458b-2: ye shes kyi yul yang yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:458b-8: mtshan ma thams cad la mi spyod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:458b-9: de sgrib pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa rab tu thob cing rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum la rnam par rtsen pas chos zab mo ston pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:458b-10: don la rton pa yin gyi tshig 'bru la rton pa ma yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:458b-11: ye shes la rton pa yin gyi rnam par shes pa la rton pa ma yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:458b-12: nges pa'i don la rton pa yin gyi drang pa'i don la rton pa ma yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:458b-13: chos nyid la rton pa yin gyi gang zag la rton pa ma yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:458b-14: sems can thams cad kyi rten du gyur pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:458b-16: rnam par rtog pa'i chags zhen pa la don la rton pa bstan nas yongs su thar bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:458b-17: rnam par shes pa'i mtshan ma la chags zhen pa la ye shes la rton pa bstan nas yongs su thar bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:458b-18: drang bar sgro btags pa la chags zhen pa la nges pa'i don la rton pa bstan nas yongs su thar bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:458b-19: gang zag la mngon par zhen cing chags zhen pa la chos nyid la rton pa bstan nas yongs su thar bar byed do //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:470a-16: mig 'phrul rnam par dbye ba la 'jug pa'i rjes su zhugs pa ma 'ongs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad go rims bzhin du brda sprod pa'i mtha' ni mi rtogs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:470a-17: de la de bzhin gshegs pa lung bstan pa thams cad la rmongs pa med de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:470a-19: sor mo lnga mthong ba'i tshul du de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyis thams cad shes te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:470b-0: @470b 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcu bdun pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:470b-3: byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na da lta byung ba'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi ye shes chags pa med pa thos na mos shing yid ches te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:470b-5: nem nur med cing mi dngang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:470b-6: mi skrag skrag par mi 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:470b-7: sangs rgyas kyi yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa la'ang mos pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:470b-8: da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gi lus kyi las dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:470b-9: lus kyi spyod lam yongs su dag pa chags pa med cing sgrib pa med pa 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams pa thams cad kyi rjes su song ba la mos so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:470b-10: da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi ngag gi las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du khyab pa'i dbyangs sgra brjod pa chags pa med cing sgrib pa med la bsam gyis mi khyab pa thams cad dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:470b-11: sangs rgyas kyi sgra skad dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:470b-13: chos kyi sgo tshad med pa bstan pa thams cad kyi rjes su song ba la mos so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:470b-14: da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi sems kyi las dus thams cad dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:471a-3: rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:471a-4: 'gro ba thams cad kyi las kyi rnam par smin pa shin tu rnam par phye ba; rnam par 'byed pa la mos so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:471a-5: da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi 'od zer gyi dra ba bkod pa chags pa med cing sgrib pa med pa la'ang mos shing yid ches te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:471a-7: nem nur med cing mi dngang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:471a-8: mi skrag skrag par mi 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:471a-9: sangs rgyas kyi yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa la'ang mos pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:471a-10: sems can gzhan dag kyang mos pa'i chos nyid rnam pa 'di lta bu yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:471a-11: de chos yang dag par blangs pa 'di dang ldan pas byang chub thob pa na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:471a-12: da ltar byung ba'i dus la de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes mthong ba chags pa med cing thogs pa med pa 'jug pa zhes bya ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:471a-14: shin tu dkar ba dri ma med pa'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin shin tu bsgoms pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:471a-15: rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi gzungs la mkhas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mtshan tha dad pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:471a-16: tshe'i tshad tha dad pa go rims bzhin du brda sprod pa'i mtha' ni mi rtogs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:471b-0: de bzhin du da ltar byung ba'i byang chub @471b sems dpa' rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:471b-4: sems can gyi spyod pa rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:471b-6: las kyi rnam par smin pa so sor myong ba rnams go rims bzhin du brda sprod pa'i mtha' ni mi rtogs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:471b-7: de bzhin du da ltar byung ba'i bskal pa thams cad de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:471b-8: bskal pa gang dag gi sangs rgyas dang bcas pa dag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:471b-9: gang dag sangs rgyas med pa dag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:471b-10: bskal pa gang la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ji snyed 'byung ba'i bskal pa de dag go rims bzhin du brda sprod pa'i mtha' ni mi rtogs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:471b-11: de bzhin du da ltar byung ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi ming tha dad pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:471b-12: gang dag kun nas nyon mongs pa can dag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:471b-13: gang dag rnam par dag pa dag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:471b-14: gang dag chung ba dag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:471b-15: gang dag cher gyur pa dag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:471b-16: gang dag phra ba dag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:471b-17: gang dag rags pa dag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:471b-18: gang dag rdul phra rab la rab tu 'jug pa'i rjes su zhugs pa dag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:471b-19: gang dag spyi'u tshugs pa dag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:471b-20: gang dag mthun pa dag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:471b-22: phyogs mtshams rnam par gzhag pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:472a-0: mig 'phrul rnam par dbye ba la 'jug @472a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:472a-1: pa'i rjes su zhugs pa da ltar byung ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad go rims bzhin du brda sprod pa'i mtha' ni mi rtogs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:472a-2: de la de bzhin gshegs pa lung bstan pa thams cad la rmongs pa med de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:472a-3: lag mthil dang sor mo lnga mthong ba'i tshul du de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyis thams cad shes te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:472a-5: 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas gyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:472a-6: bco brgyad po 'di dag la sogs pa sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa thams cad thob ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:472a-10: thams cad zil gyis gnon cing thams cad du khyad par du 'phags pa'i phyir spyi gtsug bltar mi mthong ba de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:472a-11: lus rtsi sman dang 'dra ba'i phyir mthong ma thag tu sems can rnams kyi skyon zhi bar byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:472a-12: thams cad du kho na ma tho ba med pas 'khor thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:472a-13: mi 'jigs pa rab tu thob pas bag tsha ba med pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:472a-14: yang dag par sbyor ba'i slob ma bsam pa can dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:472a-15: gdams ngag can dang rjes su bstan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:472a-16: mthun pas slob ma mi phyed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:472b-0: sems can thams @472b cad la mtshungs par gnas pas slob ma shin tu dul ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:472b-1: chos bstan pa la the tshom med pas spobs pa myur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:472b-2: gleng ba med pas sems can thams cad tshim par byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:472b-3: don yod pa'i chos ston pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:472b-4: gdul bya rnams kyi dbang po yongs su smin pas 'khor thams cad rtse gcig tu sems pa la sangs rgyas kyi sgra skad 'byin pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:472b-5: cho 'phrul bsam gyis mi khyab pas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad mngon du lta ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:472b-6: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku bsod nams tshad med pa brtan pa'i phyir blta bas mi ngoms pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:472b-7: yang dag par khong du chud pas 'bras bu yod pa'i chos ston pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:472b-8: spyod lam mi 'khrugs pas glang po'i lta stangs kyis lta ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:472b-9: spro ba che bas seng ge ltar rnam par bsgyings pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:472b-10: lus kyi las ye shes sngon du 'gro bas don yod par rnam par 'gro ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:472b-11: ngag gi las ye shes sngon du 'gro bas ngag la dbang ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:472b-12: yid kyi las ye shes sngon du 'gro bas kun nas mig dang ldan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:472b-13: spobs pa myur bas gzung bar 'os pa'i tshul dang ldan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:472b-14: bla na med pa'i sbyin gnas su gyur pa'i rnyed pa'i mchog dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:472b-15: grags pa'i mchog dang ldan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:473a-0: chos kyi dbyings kyis klas shing mthas gtugs pas bsod nams zad mi @473a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:473a-2: mthu po che chen po'i lus dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:473a-4: mi 'jigs pa'i mchog thob pas rdzi ba med pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:473a-5: sems can thams cad kyi dbang po mchog dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:473a-6: mchog ma yin pa shes pas sems can la bde ba bskyed pa las mi ldog cing 'khrugs pa med la brel phongs pa med pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:473a-7: 'jig rten thams cad kyi ston par gyur pas chos dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:473a-8: gtsug lag mang po shes pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:473a-9: chos kyi sku rab tu phye bas tshe dpag tu med pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:473a-10: shin tu mur thug cing mthas klas pas mthong ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:473a-14: thos pa don yod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:473a-15: dus gsum mnyam pa nyid du khong du chud pas shes rab mi 'khrugs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:473a-16: chos smra zhing nyes par smra ba med pas gtam rgyun chags pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:473a-17: mi dge ba'i chos thams cad ma lus pa spangs pas bag chags thams cad yang dag par bcom pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:473a-18: sangs rgyas kyi chos byung bas slob dpon med pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:473a-19: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma lus par khong du chud pas rnam pa thams cad shes pa ste; sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa 'di dag thams cad rab tu 'thob bo ////
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:473a-20: bam po bzhi pa ste tha ma /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:473b-0: de nas bcom ldan 'das la bu mo rin chen gyis @473b 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:473b-2: gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis po 'di dag sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs gang dag la zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis mngon par grub /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:473b-3: de skad ces gsol pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:473b-4: bcom ldan 'das kyis bu mo rin chen la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:473b-6: sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs tshad med grangs med pa dag la zhugs pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis mngon par grub ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:473b-7: de dag las cung zad tsam zhig bstan par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:473b-8: de bzhin gshegs pa'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan zhabs shin tu gnas pa 'di ni sngon dam bcas pa la brtan pas mngon par grub bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:473b-9: de bzhin gshegs pa'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan zhabs kyi mthil 'khor lo'i mtshan dang ldan pa 'di ni sngon sbyin pa sna tshogs bsags pas mngon par grub bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:473b-10: zhabs kyi rting pa yangs shing zhabs byin gyis mtho ba ni sngon sems can gzhan dag khyad du ma bsad pas grub bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:473b-11: sor mo ring ba ni sngon sems can rnams chos kyis bsrung shing bskyabs te sbas pa byas pas grub bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:473b-13: zhabs dra bar 'brel ba ni sngon gzhan gyi g-yog 'khor ma phye bas grub bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:474a-2: zhabs gzhon zhing 'jam pa ni sngon bgo ba sna tshogs byin pas grub bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:474a-3: bdun mtho ba ni sngon bza' ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:474a-4: btung ba rgya chen po byin pas grub bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:474a-5: byin pa ri dvags ae ne ya'i byin pa lta bu ni sngon sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su bzung bas grub bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:474a-6: gsang ba'i gnas spubs su nub pa ni sngon gsang ba'i tshig bsrung shing 'khrig pa'i chos spangs pas grub bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:474a-7: ro stong seng ge'i ro stod lta bu ni sngon dge ba'i las rgya chen po mthar gyis spyad pas grub bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:474a-8: thal gong rgyas pa ni sngon dag ba'i chos yang dag par spyad pas grub bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:474a-9: dpung mgo shin tu zlum pa ni sngon mi 'jig pas gzhan dbugs phyung bas grub bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:474a-10: phyag ma btud cing ring ba ni sngon gzhan gyis ci bya'o cog byed pa la spro bas grub bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:474a-11: sku rnam par dag pa ni sngon dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la ngoms mi myong bar yang dag par spyad pas grub bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:474a-12: mgur dung lta bu ni sngon nad pa rnams la sman sna tshogs byin pas grub bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:474a-13: 'gram pa seng ge'i 'gram pa lta bu ni sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba la spyod pa yongs su rdzogs par byas pas grub bo; ;tshems bzhi bcur tshang ba ni sngon sems can la bsam pa mnyam par sbyor bas grub bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:474b-0: tshems thags bzang ba ni sngon sems can mi 'dum pa rnams kyi bsdums byas @474b pas grub bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:474b-1: tshems mnyam pa ni sngon yid du 'ong ba'i nor bu byin pas grub bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:474b-2: tshems mche ba dkar ba ni sngon lus dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:474b-4: yid kyi las shin tu bsrungs bas grub bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:474b-5: ljags shin tu ring ba ni sngon bden pa'i tshig kun tu bsrungs bas grub bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:474b-6: ro bro ba'i mchog dang ldan pa ni sngon bsod nams tshad med pas brtan cing yid du 'ong ba'i ro bro ba byin pas grub bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:474b-8: ka la pingka'i sgra dbyangs dang ldan pa ni sngon sems can la 'jam pa'i tshig smras pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:474b-10: kun dga' ba'i tshig bsgrags pas grub bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:474b-11: spyan mthon mthing dang ldan pa ni sngon byams pa dang ldan zhing thams cad bsrungs pas grub bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:474b-12: spyan gyi rdzim ba'i rdzim lta bu ni sngon bsam pa sgyu med pas grub bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:474b-13: dpral ba'i smin mtshams kyi spu shin tu dkar ba ni sngon bsngags par 'os pa rnams kyi bsngags pa brjod pas grub bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:474b-14: dbu gtsug tor dang ldan pa ni sngon bla ma la gus shing 'dud pas grub bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:474b-15: pags pa srab pa ni sngon chos yang dag par 'gro ba'i sems las su rung bas grub bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:474b-16: pags pa'i mdog gser 'dra ba ni sngon yid du 'ong ba'i gos dang mal stan byin pas grub bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:474b-17: spu'i khung bu nas ba spu re re skyes pa ni sngon 'du 'dzi yongs su spangs pas grub bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:475a-0: spu'i rtse mo g-yas su 'khyil ba ni sngon @475a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:475a-3: dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdams ngag mthun par 'dzin pas grub bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:475a-4: dbu skra aindra n'i la lta bu ni sngon srog chags thams cad la snying brtse zhing rdo dbyug dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:475a-5: mtshon cha bor bas grub bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:475a-6: shing n+ya gro dha ltar chu zheng gab pa ni sngon bdag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:475a-7: sems can gzhan dag kyang ting nge 'dzin la sbyor bas grub bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:475a-8: de bzhin gshegs pa'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan mthu bo che chen po'i lus kun nas mdzes pa 'di ni sngon de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:475a-9: mchod rten zhig pa bcos pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:475a-10: gzhan 'jigs pa dag dbugs phyung ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:475a-11: sems can mi 'dum pa'i bsdums byas pas grub pa ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:475a-13: sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba'i chos tshad med grangs med pa 'di dag spyad pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis mngon par grub bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:475a-14: de nas bcom ldan 'das la bu mo rin chen gyis 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:475a-16: ji tsam du de de bzhin gshegs pas sngon gyi rgyu las byung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba las brtsams te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:475a-17: sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad bka' stsal pa 'di ni ngo mtshar to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:475a-18: de skad ces gsol pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:475b-0: bcom ldan 'das kyis bu mo rin chen la @475b 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:475b-4: de bzhin gshegs pas sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad bstan pa 'di las bstan to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:475b-6: gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i sngon gyi rgyu las byung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba las brtsams te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:475b-7: sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad bstan pa 'di thos pa thos nas kyang de bzhin nyid du grub pa de dag thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyis rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan par 'gyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' rnyed pa legs par rnyed pa da dag la ltos /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:475b-8: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:481b-3: nam mkha'i khams ni zad 'gyur la //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:483b-9: rnam par grol ba'i phung po shin tu dkar bar byas pa'i phyir theg pa de ni nges par 'gro ba'o //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:484a-0: sems can thams cad la byams pa'i sems kyi phyir theg @484a *//

K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:484a-11: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pas theg pa de ni bdud dang /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:484b-4: thabs la mkhas pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir theg pa de ni theg pa thams cad kyis ci rigs par 'byung ba'o //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:484b-9: phas kyi rgol ba thams cad kyis bltar mi mthong bas theg pa de ni dbang po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:484b-11: byang chub kyi yan lag gi kha khyer gyis yongs su bskor ba'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:484b-12: sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad bde bar lta ba'i phyir theg pa de ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhis 'gro ba'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:484b-13: dge ba'i chos thams cad dang ldan pa'i phyir theg pa de ni yang dag par spong ba la mnyam par legs par gnas pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:484b-14: bar mi phyed pas theg pa de ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa shin tu yongs su sbyang ba byas pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:484b-15: zag pa med pa'i chos 'ong ba'i phyir theg pa de ni khams gsum las 'byung ba'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:485a-0: 'dus byas kyi khams kyi snang ba thob pas theg pa de ni 'dus byas kyi khams @485a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:485a-3: rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi theg pa mi 'dod pas theg pa de ni byang chub kyi sems mi brjed cing kha lo sgyur te legs par khrid pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:485a-4: spyi gtsug bltar mi mthong bas theg pa de ni mngon par 'phags pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:485a-5: theg pa de ni bsod nams kyi tshogs kyis brgyan pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:485a-6: theg pa de ni ye shes kyi tshogs kyis sems kyi bsam pa rab tu shes pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:485a-7: gtan pa med pa'i mchod sbyin byed pas theg pa de ni sgo phye pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:485a-8: sangs rgyas kyi ye shes mnyam pa'i phyir theg pa de ni ro gcig pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:485a-9: grags pa phyogs bcur grags pa'i phyir theg pa de ni bsgrags pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:485a-10: legs par byas pa'i las kyi phyir theg pa de ni lha thams cad kyis phyag byas pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:485a-11: bsngags pa mtha' yas pas theg pa de ni brgya byin dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:485a-13: 'jig rten skyong ba thams cad kyis mngon par bstod pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:485a-14: sbyin pa sngon du 'gro bas theg pa de ni ser sna can rnams la gtong ba sbyin pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:485a-15: snying rje chen pos shin tu zin pas theg pa de ni ngang tshul ngan pa rnams la tshul khrims sbyin pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:485a-16: sems can thams cad la khong khro ba'i sems med pas theg pa de ni gnod pa'i sems dang ldan pa rnams la bzod pa sbyin pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:485b-0: go cha brtan pa mi 'dor bas theg pa de ni le lo can rnams la brtson 'grus @485b sbyin pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:485b-1: sems dul zhing zhi la las su rung bas theg pa de ni sems g-yeng ba rnams la bsam gtan sbyan pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:485b-2: sems can thams cad thos pa la sbyor bas theg pa de ni shes rab 'chal ba rnams la shes rab sbyin pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:485b-3: sdig pa thams cad mi byed pas theg pa de ni bde ba thams cad sgrub cing sdug bsngal thams cad sel ba'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:485b-4: theg pa de ni chags pa med pa'i ye shes kyis sangs rgyas kyis ye shes dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:485b-5: chags pa med pa'i ye shes kun tu ston pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:485b-6: theg pa thams cad kyi spyi bor phyin pa ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:485b-7: de'i phyir theg pa chen po zhes bya'o; ;chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na srog chags khri nyis stong ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:485b-9: bdag kyang theg pa chen por zhugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:485b-10: sems can tshad ma mchis pa theg pa chen po 'di la dgod par bgyi'o zhes smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:485b-11: de nas bcom ldan 'das la bu mo rin chen gyis 'di skad ces gsol to; ;bcom ldan 'das /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:485b-12: gang gis thams cad mkhyen par myur du nges par mi 'byung ba theg pa chen po'i bar du gcod pa gang lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:485b-13: de skad ces gsol pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:485b-14: bcom ldan 'das kyi bu mo rin chen la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:485b-16: theg pa chen po'i bar du gcod pa sum cu rtsa gnyis te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:486a-0: bar du gcod pa de dag gis thams cad mkhyen pa myur du nges @486a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:486a-2: sum cu rtsa gnyis gang zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:486a-4: nyan thos kyi theg pa 'dod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:486a-5: rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa 'dod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:486a-7: tshangs pa nyid mngon par 'dod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:486a-8: skye ba la gnas te tshangs par spyod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:486a-9: dge ba'i rtsa ba gcig la chags pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:486a-10: longs spyod bdog pa rnams la ser sna byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:486a-11: sems can rnams la mnyam par mi sbyin pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:486a-13: byang chub kyi sems mi srung ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:486a-15: khong khro ba bag la nyal bar byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:486a-18: thos pa don du mi gnyer ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:486a-21: nga rgyal las kyang nga rgyal 'phel ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:486a-24: sems kyi las yongs su ma dag pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:486a-25: dam pa'i chos mi srung ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:486a-27: bsdu ba'i dngos po rnams 'dor ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:486a-28: yang dag par dga' bar 'gyur ba'i chos gtong ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:486a-29: sdig pa'i grogs po ston pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:486a-30: byang chub tu yongs su mi bsngo ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:486a-31: phung po gsum pa dang mi mthun pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:486a-32: dge ba'i rtsa ba chung dus rlom sems su byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:486a-33: thabs med par lhung ba'i blo dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:486b-0: phyir zhing dkon mchog @486b gsum gyi bsngags ba mi smra ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:486b-1: byang chub sems dpa' la gnod par sems pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:486b-2: ma thos pa'i chos spong ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:486b-3: bdud kyi las khong du mi chud pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:486b-4: 'jig rten rgyad pa na pa'i gsang tshig 'dzin pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:486b-5: sems can yongs su smin par mi byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:486b-6: 'khor bas yongs su skyo ba ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:486b-7: sum cu rtsa gnyis po de dag ni theg pa chen po'i bar du gcod pa yang dag phul yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:486b-8: bar du gcod pa de dag gis thams cad mkhyen par myur du nges par mi 'byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:486b-11: theg pa chen po'i yon tan ji tsam ba bar du gcod pa'ang de tsam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:486b-13: 'dus byas kyi skyon ji tsam pa theg pa chen po'i bar du gcod pa'ang de tsam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:486b-14: mya ngan las 'das pa'i yon tan ji tsam pa theg pa chen po'i yon tan dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:486b-16: theg pa chen po'i yon tan dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:486b-17: bsngags pa ji tsam pa de bzhin gshegs pas sems kyi nye ba'i nyon mongs pa rab tu mkhyen pa'ang de tsam ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:486b-18: de dag thams cad ni theg pa chen po'i bar du gcod pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:486b-19: de bzhin gshegs pas sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rab tu mkhyen pa ji tsam pa theg pa chen po'i bsngags pa dang yon tan yang de tsam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:487a-0: de lta bas na ci nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos theg pa chen po'i nyon mongs par gyur pa'i chos yongs su @487a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:487a-2: chos gang dag gis theg pa chen po rnam par dag par 'gyur ba'i chos de dag la bstan par bya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:487a-5: de la theg pa chen po rnam par dag par 'gyur ba'i chos de gang zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:487a-6: bu mo chos sum cu rtsa gnyis po 'di dag ni theg pa chen po rnam par dag par 'gyur ba ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:487a-7: sum cu rtsa gnyis gang zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:487a-9: gsol ba ma btab par sems can thams cad la dge ba'i bshes gnyen du gyur pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:487a-10: gzhan gyis byas pa rnams la mngon par dga' ba med pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:487a-11: dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs thams cad la bsam pa gtan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:487a-12: bya ba thams cad yongs su grub pa la zhum pa med pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:487a-13: bsam pa dag pas sems rnyog pa med pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:487a-14: spyod lam thams cad du rnam par mi rtog pas lus yongs su dag pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:487a-15: ji skad smras pa de bzhin du byed pas ngag yongs su dag pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:487a-16: byang chub kyi sems mi 'dor bas yongs su dag pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:487a-17: lan la mi re bas sbyin pa yongs su dag pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:487a-18: ngang tshul ngan pa yongs su skyob pas tshul khrims yongs su dag pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:487a-20: srog la mi lta bas bzod pa yongs su dag pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:487a-21: stobs bcu dag mi 'jigs pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed pas brtson 'grus yongs su dag pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:487b-0: nyon mongs pa @487b thams cad kyis zil gyis mi non pas bsam gtan yongs su dag pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:487b-1: bag chags thams cad yang dag par 'joms pas shes rab yongs su dag pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:487b-2: bdud kyi las thams cad yongs su spong bas sems dpa' dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:487b-3: kha 'og tu lus 'khrus par byed pas yi dam la brtan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:487b-4: sems can yongs su smin par byed pas bsdu ba'i dngos po rnams mi 'dor ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:487b-5: dam pa'i chos yongs su srung bas sangs rgyas la byas pa gzo ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:487b-6: byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rab tu rdzogs par byed pas yongs su mi skyo ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:487b-8: ye shes rab tu rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir thos pas mi ngoms pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:487b-9: gong ma'i khyad par khong du chud pas de la mi chags pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:487b-10: spyi gtsug bltar mi mthong bar bya ba'i phyir nga rgyal med par nyan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:487b-12: rkyen tshogs pa shin tu mthong ba'i phyir chos thams cad dang 'gal ba med pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:487b-13: 'phags pa'i nor bdun rab tu thob pa'i phyir dbul ba med pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:487b-14: bdag la dbang bas rang dbang yod de bran ma yin pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:487b-16: ye shes kyi tshogs mngon par bsgrubs pa'i mngon par shes pa rnams kyis sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa zhi bar byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:487b-17: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rig pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:487b-18: rnam par grol ba bsgrubs pas zhi gnas kyi tshogs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:488a-3: smon pa med pa bsgom pa'i phyir rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum gyi sgo mo kun tu ston pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:488a-4: sems can thams cad snyed kyi ye shes khong du chud pas nad nye bar zhi ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:488a-5: mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa'i phyir zad pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:488a-6: mi skye ba shes pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:488a-7: chos thams cad la nan tan snying por byed cing gnas pa lung bstan pa ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:488a-9: chos sum cu rtsa gnyis po de dag ni theg pa chen po rnam par dag par 'gyur ba'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:488a-10: theg pa chen po rnam par dag pa'i le'u'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na lha dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:488a-11: mi'i skye dgu srog chags bdun khri nyis stong ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:488a-12: byang chub sems dpa' khri nyis stong ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa rab tu thob par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:488a-13: steng gi bar snang las kyang lha brgya stong gis ca co dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:488a-14: gzha'i sgra byung ste me tog kyang gtor /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:488a-15: sil snyan yang dkrol nas gang theg pa chen po'i yon tan dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:488a-16: bsngags pa bstan pa'i chos kyi sgo'i le'u 'di thos la thos nas kyang mos pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:488a-17: mos nas kyang len cing 'dzin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:488a-18: yang dag par nan tan byed pa'i sems can de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi yon tan la nges par gnas par 'gyur ro zhes ched du brjod pa de skad du ched du brjod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:488b-0: de nas bcom @488b ldan 'das la lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:488b-1: mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:488b-2: rgyal po chen po bzhis 'di skad ces gsol te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:488b-5: ji tsam du chos kyi rnam grangs don mang po dang ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:488b-6: sgribs pa'i nyon mongs pa zhi bar bgyid pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:488b-7: nges pa'i don dang ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:488b-10: phas kyi rgol ba thams cad rab tu 'dul ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:488b-11: sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kun tu 'dzin pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:488b-13: zab mo nges pa'i tshig bstan pa 'di bstan pa ngo mtshar to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:488b-15: bdag cag gis kyang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di blang bar bgyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:488b-17: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di chos smra ba gang gis sug par mchis pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:488b-19: glegs bam du mchis par 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:488b-23: dri za gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mos pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:488b-24: 'dzin par 'gyur ba de dag yongs su gzung ba'i sug las bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:488b-25: gang sems sdang bas skabs tshol ba de dag ci nas kyang chos smra ba de dag la 'tshe bar mi 'gyur bar shin tu tshar dgum par bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:488b-26: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:488b-27: mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:488b-28: 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi la legs so zhes bya ba gnang ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:489a-0: chos smra ba yongs su gzung ba'i @489a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:489a-1: phyir dam bcas par gyur pa ni legs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:489a-4: chos smra ba yongs su gzung bas dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba yin no; ;dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung bas sems can thams cad yongs su gzung ba byas pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:489a-5: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa; kun dga' bo /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:489a-6: bu mo rin chen gyis dam pa'i chos yongs su dris pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di zungs shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:489a-9: gzhan la'ang rgya cher rab tu ston cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:489a-11: byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa la mos pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:489a-12: dmigs pa la gnas pa'i bzod pas bskal pa brgya stong du sbyin pa byin pas gang yang byang chub sems dpa' gzhan zhig chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la zhugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:489a-13: gzhan dag la'ang rab tu ston cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:489a-14: sems can rab tu thar bar bya ba la dmigs nas snying rje chen po la gnas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:489a-15: gang byams pa chen po dang ldan zhing chos nges par sems pa'i bzod pa la rab tu zhugs na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:489a-16: de de bas bsod nams ches mang du 'phel te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:489a-17: 'di ltar theg pa chen po la ches myur du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:489a-18: de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:489a-19: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:489b-1: bdag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gzung lags na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:489b-2: bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:489b-4: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:489b-6: de bas na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bden pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:489b-9: 'dul ba la mkhas pas sgo'i le'u zhes bya bar zungs shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:489b-10: yon tan rin po che mtha' yas sems bskyed pa bstan pa zhes bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:489b-11: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:489b-13: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:489b-14: mtshan rab tu dbye ba bstan pa zhes bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:489b-15: byang chub sems dpa'i chos spyod pa mtha' dag ces bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:489b-16: phyir mi ldog pa'i phyir phyag rgya bsten pa zhes bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:489b-17: theg pa chen po'i man ngag ces bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:489b-18: 'dul ba'i le'u zhes bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:489b-19: bu mo rin chen gyis zhus pa zhes bya bar yang zungs shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:489b-21: khyod kyis chos kyi sgo'i le'u 'di bzung zhing gzhan dag la'ang bshad na yon tan gyi chos dpag tu med pa la chos kyi snang ba thob par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:489b-22: sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pas nye bar gnas par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:489b-26: da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byang chub ni 'dir 'dus pa'i phyir ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:490a-0: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa @490a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:490a-2: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:490a-7: dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la yi rangs te mngon par bstod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:490a-8: 'phags pa theg pa chen po'i man ngag ces bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so ////
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:490a-9: rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-012:490a-11: zhus chen gyi lo ts'a ba bande ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa //
